activities.name: Load FQT DB CLient Goal Table from CRM

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select cg.po_Account as "AccountId",acc.name as "AccountName",sm.value as "Entry Term"
,sm1.value as "AcademicYear",cg.po_InqCountGoal,cg.po_AppCountGoal
,cg.po_AdmCountGoal,cg.po_EnrCountGoal,cg.po_DepCountGoal,su.FullName as "CreatedBy"
,cg.CreatedOn,su.FullName as "ModifiedBy",cg.ModifiedOn
from dbo.po_clientgoaldetailsBase cg
left join dbo.AccountBase acc on acc.AccountId = cg.po_Account
left join dbo.StringMapBase sm on sm.AttributeValue = cg.po_EntryTerm and sm.AttributeName = 'po_EntryTerm'
and sm.ObjectTypeCode = (select ObjectTypeCode from entityview where name = 'po_clientgoaldetails')
left join dbo.StringMapBase sm1 on sm1.AttributeValue = cg.po_AcademicYear and sm1.AttributeName = 'po_AcademicYear'
and sm1.ObjectTypeCode = (select ObjectTypeCode from entityview where name = 'po_clientgoaldetails')
left join dbo.SystemUserBase su on su.SystemUserId=cg.CreatedBy
left join dbo.SystemUserBase su1 on su1.SystemUserId=cg.ModifiedBy

activities.name: Data for Enrichment
activities.description: Get all the records from the Alignment tables where pe_flag='DIA Approved'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #temp_PE
SELECT DISTINCT (ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by (select null))) % 7 rnk,c.source_key
,c.LastName
,a.Line1
,a.Line2
,a.City
,a.StateOrProvince
,a.PostalCode
,c.AccountNumber
into #temp_PE
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a 
JOIN alignment.contactbase c 
ON a.source_key = c.source_key
Left Join config.Enrichment b on a.source_key = b.source_key 
WHERE c.pe_flag = 'DIA Approved'
AND c.crm_flag =2
AND a.md_flag in ('Enriched', 'ADS Referenced', 'No Enrichment', 'Not Enriched')
AND b.source_key is null
--and a.modified_fileName = 'EMScoring_DaltonStateCollege_202207261412123680.csv'

Insert Into config.Enrichment
Select source_key,'Sequence' from #temp_PE

Select * from #temp_PE

sqlReaderQuery.value:
--ContactBase Audit Update
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #temp
select distinct  response_id
                ,mapping_id
                ,account_name
                ,modified_fileName
                --,max(md_received_date) as max_md_received_date
                ,count(*) RecordCount
                ,pe_flag
INTO #temp
from alignment.contactbase a
--where md_flag in ('Enriched','Not Enriched')
where pe_flag not in ('No Enrichment')
and not exists (Select 'X' from audit.dia_manual b
                where a.response_id = b.response_id
                and a.mapping_id = b.mapping_id
                and Process_Layer = 'Enrichment'
                and dia_status = 'DE_Completed')
group by response_id, mapping_id, account_name, modified_fileName,pe_flag

MERGE audit.data_Enrichment AS TARGET
USING #temp AS SOURCE
ON TARGET.response_id = SOURCE.response_id
And TARGET.mapping_id = SOURCE.mapping_id
AND TARGET.flags = SOURCE.pe_flag
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.Count_PE <> SOURCE.RecordCount
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.Count_PE = SOURCE.RecordCount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (response_id
            ,mapping_id
            ,account_name
            ,modified_fileName
            ,table_name
            ,process_layer
            ,count_PE
            ,flags
            ,placed_by
            ,actions_taken
            ,insert_datetime
            ,insert_by)
VALUES (    
             SOURCE.response_id
             ,SOURCE.mapping_id
             ,SOURCE.account_name
             ,SOURCE.modified_fileName
             ,'contactbase'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,SOURCE.RecordCount
             ,SOURCE.pe_flag
             ,'External Platform'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,format(getdate(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
             ,'PacificEast Pipeline');

--customer_address_base Audit Update
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #tempc
select distinct  response_id
                ,mapping_id
                ,account_name
                ,modified_fileName
                --,max(md_received_date) as max_md_received_date
                ,count(*) RecordCount
                ,pe_flag
INTO #tempc
from alignment.customer_address_base a
--where md_flag in ('Enriched','Not Enriched')
where pe_flag not in ('No Enrichment')
and not exists (Select 'X' from audit.dia_manual b
                where a.response_id = b.response_id
                and a.mapping_id = b.mapping_id
                and Process_Layer = 'Enrichment'
                and dia_status = 'DE_Completed')
group by response_id, mapping_id, account_name, modified_fileName,pe_flag

MERGE audit.data_Enrichment AS TARGET
USING #tempc AS SOURCE
ON TARGET.response_id = SOURCE.response_id
And TARGET.mapping_id = SOURCE.mapping_id
AND TARGET.flags = SOURCE.pe_flag
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.Count_PE <> SOURCE.RecordCount
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.Count_PE = SOURCE.RecordCount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (response_id
            ,mapping_id
            ,account_name
            ,modified_fileName
            ,table_name
            ,process_layer
            ,count_PE
            ,flags
            ,placed_by
            ,actions_taken
            ,insert_datetime
            ,insert_by)
VALUES (    
             SOURCE.response_id
             ,SOURCE.mapping_id
             ,SOURCE.account_name
             ,SOURCE.modified_fileName
             ,'customer_address_base'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,SOURCE.RecordCount
             ,SOURCE.pe_flag
             ,'External Platform'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,format(getdate(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
             ,'PacificEast Pipeline');

activities.name: Audit_Query-Data Enrichment
activities.description: Fetching details from customer_address_base for Audit insert

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #temp
select distinct  response_id
                ,mapping_id
                ,account_name
                ,modified_fileName
                --,max(md_received_date) as max_md_received_date
                ,count(*) RecordCount
                ,md_flag
INTO #temp
from alignment.customer_address_base a
--where md_flag in ('Enriched','Not Enriched')
where md_flag not in ('No Enrichment')
and not exists (Select 'X' from audit.dia_manual b
                where a.response_id = b.response_id
                and a.mapping_id = b.mapping_id
                and Process_Layer = 'Enrichment'
                and dia_status = 'DE_Completed')
group by response_id, mapping_id, account_name, modified_fileName,md_flag

MERGE audit.data_Enrichment AS TARGET
USING #temp AS SOURCE
ON TARGET.response_id = SOURCE.response_id
And TARGET.mapping_id = SOURCE.mapping_id
AND TARGET.flags = SOURCE.md_flag
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.Count_MD <> SOURCE.RecordCount
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.Count_MD = SOURCE.RecordCount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (response_id
            ,mapping_id
            ,account_name
            ,modified_fileName
            ,table_name
            ,process_layer
            ,count_MD
            ,flags
            ,placed_by
            ,actions_taken
            ,insert_datetime
            ,insert_by)
VALUES (    
             SOURCE.response_id
             ,SOURCE.mapping_id
             ,SOURCE.account_name
             ,SOURCE.modified_fileName
             ,'customer_address_base'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,SOURCE.RecordCount
             ,SOURCE.md_flag
             ,'External Platform'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,format(getdate(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
             ,'Melissa Pipeline');

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
 c.source_key
,c.FirstName
,c.LastName
,c.Telephone1
,c.STUDENTID
,c.EMailAddress1
,c.Telephone2
,c.BirthDate
,a.Line1
,a.Line2
,a.City
,a.StateOrProvince
,a.PostalCode
,a.Country
,a.address_key
,a.county_fips
,a.County
,a.Latitude
,a.Longitude
,a.ZIP
,a.md_flag
,a.md_received_date
,c.pe_flag
,c.pe_received_date
,c.account_id as account_id 
,coalesce(c.accountNumber,a.accountNumber) as accountNumber
,Coalesce(c.account_name,a.account_name) as account_name
,a.modified_filename
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a 
JOIN alignment.contactbase c 
ON  a.response_id = c.response_id
and a.source_key = c.source_key
Join audit.ADS_Reference_Log b
--on b.modified_filename = c.modified_filename
on b.response_id = c.response_id
WHERE (c.pe_flag = 'DIA Review'
or a.pe_flag = 'DIA Review'
or a.md_flag = 'DIA Review')
and DE_Status = 'ADS_Review'

Select * 
from dia.AlignmentADSReference 
where PE_ADS_Reference = 1 
or MD_ADS_Reference = 1

scripts.text:
delete from dia.PreStg_AlignmentADSReference
where Source_Key in (select Source_Key from dia.AlignmentADSReference)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select Distinct  trim(a.response_id) response_id
				,a.mapping_id
				,a.Modified_Filename
				,cast(1 as bit) as ADS_Review 
				,cast(0 as bit) as ADS_Reference
				,cast(0 as bit) as Enrichment
				,getdate() as insert_datetime
				,SYSTEM_USER as Insert_by
				,'ADS_Review' as DE_Status
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a
join alignment.contactbase b
on a.response_id = b.response_id
and a.source_key = b.source_key
WHERE a.modified_fileName is not null
and (
--a.pe_flag = 'DIA Review'or 
a.md_flag = 'DIA Review'
)
and b.crm_flag = 2
--and a.modified_fileName in (Select modified_fileName from audit.File_Processing_Status where crm_flag = 2)
and not exists 
(Select 'X' from dia.AlignmentADSReference t
	where a.source_key = t.source_key)

properties.description: DQE profiling audit with error and warning count

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select count(*) error_count,r.errorcode,r.operator,r.value1,r.errordescription,r.warningdescription,f.response_id,f.mapping_id,f.purpose_name,f.account_name from config.rules r
JOIN @{pipeline().parameters.staging_table} e   ON e.error_code LIKE '%'+ r.errorcode +'%'
or  e.warning_code LIKE '%'+ r.errorcode +'%'
Join audit.file_metadata f ON f.response_id = e.response_id
and f.mapping_id = e.mapping_id
where r.purposeName = '@{pipeline().parameters.purposename}'
and e.response_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.responseid}'
group by r.errorcode,r.operator,r.value1,r.warningcode,f.response_id,f.mapping_id,f.purpose_name,f.account_name,r.errordescription,r.warningdescription

select count(*) warning_count,r.operator,r.value1,r.warningcode,r.errordescription,r.warningdescription,f.response_id,f.mapping_id,f.purpose_name,f.account_name from config.rules r
JOIN @{pipeline().parameters.staging_table} e   ON  e.warning_code LIKE '%'+ r.warningcode +'%'
Join audit.file_metadata f ON f.response_id = e.response_id
and f.mapping_id = e.mapping_id
where r.purposeName = '@{pipeline().parameters.purposename}'
and e.response_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.responseid}'
group by r.errorcode,r.operator,r.value1,r.warningcode,f.response_id,f.mapping_id,f.purpose_name,f.account_name,r.errordescription,r.warningdescription

select distinct
popb_purposefieldrule.popb_purposefieldruleId 'id',
popb_purposefield.popb_schemaname  'schemaname',
StringMap.Value 'scope',
popb_value.popb_value 'operator',
popb_value1 'value1',
popb_value2 'value2',
popb_resultfield1 'resultfield',
popb_resultfield1_value 'resultfieldvalue',
popb_errorcode 'errorcode',
popb_warningcode 'warningcode',
popb_priority 'priority',
popb_purposefield.popb_purposeidName 'purposeidName',
popb_purposefieldrule.popb_name 'name',
popb_errordescription 'errordescription',
popb_warningdescription 'warningdescription'
from popb_purposefieldrule with (nolock)
inner join popb_purposefield with (nolock) on popb_purposefield.popb_purposefieldId=popb_purposefieldrule.popb_purposefieldid 
inner join StringMap with (nolock) on StringMap.AttributeName='popb_sope' and StringMap.AttributeValue=popb_purposefieldrule.popb_scope
inner join popb_value with (nolock) on popb_purposefieldrule.popb_operator=popb_value.popb_valueId

select po_type, po_clientcode, po_clientvalue, po_RNLCode, po_RNLValue, AccountName, [AccountId]
from (
 select po_type, po_clientcode, po_clientvalue, po_RNLCode, po_RNLValue, AccountName, [AccountId],
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY po_type, po_clientcode,[AccountId] ORDER BY [CodePriority], po_RNLCode) AS rn
 from 
 (
  SELECT REPLACE(convert(nvarchar,b.value), ',', '--') [po_type],REPLACE([po_clientcode],',','--') [po_clientcode],
  REPLACE([po_clientvalue],',','--') [po_clientvalue],REPLACE([po_RNLCode],',','--') [po_RNLCode],REPLACE([po_RNLValue],',','--') [po_RNLValue]  
  , 1 [CodePriority], REPLACE(ab.Name,',','--') [AccountName], REPLACE(ab.AccountId,',','--') [AccountId]
  FROM [po_institutioncrossreferenceBase] a
  inner join [stringmap] b on b.attributename='po_type' and b.attributevalue=a.po_type 
  inner join AccountBase ab on ab.AccountId=a.po_Accountid
  WHERE a.statecode=0
   
  union  
  select 'major_value' [po_type],  REPLACE(po_institutionmajorcode,',','--') [po_clientcode] ,REPLACE(po_institutionmajorcode,',','--')[po_clientvalue],REPLACE(lkp.po_Code,',','--') [po_RNLCode],REPLACE(po_lookupidname,',','--') [po_RNLValue]
  , 3 [CodePriority], REPLACE(ab.Name,',','--') [AccountName], REPLACE(ab.AccountId,',','--') [AccountId]
  from [po_majordegree] md
  inner join po_lookup lkp on lkp.po_lookupId=md.po_lookupid
  inner join [stringmap] b on b.attributename='po_type' and b.attributevalue=lkp.po_type and objecttypecode='10095'
  inner join AccountBase ab on ab.AccountId=md.po_InstitutionId
  where po_institutionmajorcode IS NOT NULL
  union  
  SELECT REPLACE(convert(nvarchar,b.value),',','--') [po_type],REPLACE([po_clientcode],',','--') [po_clientcode],REPLACE([po_clientvalue],',','--') [po_clientvalue],
  REPLACE([po_RNLCode],',','--') [po_RNLCode],REPLACE([po_RNLValue],',','--') [po_RNLValue] 
  , 2 [CodePriority], REPLACE(ab.Name,',','--') [AccountName], REPLACE(ab.AccountId,',','--') [AccountId]
  FROM [po_institutioncrossreferenceBase] a
  inner join [stringmap] b on b.attributename='po_type' and b.attributevalue=a.po_type and objecttypecode='10158'
  inner join AccountBase ab on ab.AccountId=a.po_Accountid
  WHERE a.statecode=0
 
  union 
  select 'major_value' [po_type],  REPLACE(po_institutionmajorcode,',','--') [po_clientcode] ,REPLACE(po_institutionmajorcode,',','--')[po_clientvalue],REPLACE(lkp.po_Code,',','--') [po_RNLCode],REPLACE(po_lookupidname,',','--') [po_RNLValue]
  , 4 [CodePriority],  REPLACE(ab.Name,',','--') [AccountName], REPLACE(ab.AccountId,',','--') [AccountId]
  from [po_majordegree] md
  inner join po_lookup lkp on lkp.po_lookupId=md.po_lookupid
  inner join [stringmap] b on b.attributename='po_type' and b.attributevalue=lkp.po_type and objecttypecode='10095'
  inner join AccountBase ab on ab.AccountId=md.po_InstitutionId
  where po_institutionmajorcode IS NOT NULL
  
 ) sub
) sub 
where rn = 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by (select null))) % 5 rnk,
source_key,Line1,Line2,City,StateOrProvince,Country,PostalCode
From (
Select top 2500 a.source_key,isnull(a.Line1,'''') as Line1,isnull(a.Line2,'''') as Line2,isnull(a.City,'''') as City
,isnull(a.StateOrProvince,'''') as StateOrProvince,isnull(a.Country,'''') as Country,Replace(isnull(a.ZIP,''''),'''''''','''') as PostalCode,a.response_id
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a
join alignment.contactbase c
on a.source_key = c.source_key
Left Join (
Select distinct trim(response_id) response_id, purpose_name from (
Select response_id, purpose_name
,row_number() over (partition by response_id order by insert_datetime desc) rnk
from audit.file_metadata
) Drv where rnk =1)b on a.response_id = b.response_id
WHERE md_flag=''DIA Approved''
AND c.crm_flag = 2
AND b.purpose_name = ''EM GO''
AND a.response_id=''',pipeline().parameters.response_id,'''',') DRV')

activities.name: Data for Enrichment
activities.description: Get all the records from the Alignment tables where pe_flag='DIA Approved'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #temp_PE
SELECT DISTINCT (ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by (select null))) % 7 rnk,c.source_key
,c.LastName
,a.Line1
,a.Line2
,a.City
,a.StateOrProvince
,a.PostalCode
,c.AccountNumber
into #temp_PE
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a 
JOIN alignment.contactbase c 
ON a.source_key = c.source_key
Left Join config.Enrichment b on a.source_key = b.source_key 
Left Join (
Select distinct response_id, purpose_name from (
Select response_id, purpose_name
,row_number() over (partition by response_id order by insert_datetime desc) rnk
from audit.file_metadata
) Drv where rnk =1
)d on a.response_id = d.response_id
WHERE c.pe_flag = ''DIA Approved''
AND c.crm_flag =2
AND a.md_flag in (''Enriched'', ''ADS Referenced'', ''No Enrichment'', ''Not Enriched'')
AND b.source_key is null
AND d.purpose_name = ''',pipeline().parameters.purpose_name,'''
AND d.response_id = ''',pipeline().parameters.response_id,'''',

'Insert Into config.Enrichment
Select source_key,''Sequence'',''',pipeline().parameters.purpose_name,''' from #temp_PE

Select * from #temp_PE')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
--ContactBase Audit Update
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #temp
select distinct  response_id
                ,mapping_id
                ,account_name
                ,modified_fileName
                --,max(md_received_date) as max_md_received_date
                ,count(*) RecordCount
                ,pe_flag
INTO #temp
from alignment.contactbase a
--where md_flag in ('Enriched','Not Enriched')
where pe_flag not in ('No Enrichment')
and not exists (Select 'X' from audit.dia_manual b
                where a.response_id = b.response_id
                and a.mapping_id = b.mapping_id
                and Process_Layer = 'Enrichment'
                and dia_status = 'DE_Completed')
group by response_id, mapping_id, account_name, modified_fileName,pe_flag

MERGE audit.data_Enrichment AS TARGET
USING #temp AS SOURCE
ON TARGET.response_id = SOURCE.response_id
And TARGET.mapping_id = SOURCE.mapping_id
AND TARGET.flags = SOURCE.pe_flag
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.Count_PE <> SOURCE.RecordCount
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.Count_PE = SOURCE.RecordCount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (response_id
            ,mapping_id
            ,account_name
            ,modified_fileName
            ,table_name
            ,process_layer
            ,count_PE
            ,flags
            ,placed_by
            ,actions_taken
            ,insert_datetime
            ,insert_by)
VALUES (    
             SOURCE.response_id
             ,SOURCE.mapping_id
             ,SOURCE.account_name
             ,SOURCE.modified_fileName
             ,'contactbase'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,SOURCE.RecordCount
             ,SOURCE.pe_flag
             ,'External Platform'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,format(getdate(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
             ,'PacificEast Pipeline');

--customer_address_base Audit Update
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #tempc
select distinct  response_id
                ,mapping_id
                ,account_name
                ,modified_fileName
                --,max(md_received_date) as max_md_received_date
                ,count(*) RecordCount
                ,pe_flag
INTO #tempc
from alignment.customer_address_base a
--where md_flag in ('Enriched','Not Enriched')
where pe_flag not in ('No Enrichment')
and not exists (Select 'X' from audit.dia_manual b
                where a.response_id = b.response_id
                and a.mapping_id = b.mapping_id
                and Process_Layer = 'Enrichment'
                and dia_status = 'DE_Completed')
group by response_id, mapping_id, account_name, modified_fileName,pe_flag

MERGE audit.data_Enrichment AS TARGET
USING #tempc AS SOURCE
ON TARGET.response_id = SOURCE.response_id
And TARGET.mapping_id = SOURCE.mapping_id
AND TARGET.flags = SOURCE.pe_flag
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.Count_PE <> SOURCE.RecordCount
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.Count_PE = SOURCE.RecordCount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (response_id
            ,mapping_id
            ,account_name
            ,modified_fileName
            ,table_name
            ,process_layer
            ,count_PE
            ,flags
            ,placed_by
            ,actions_taken
            ,insert_datetime
            ,insert_by)
VALUES (    
             SOURCE.response_id
             ,SOURCE.mapping_id
             ,SOURCE.account_name
             ,SOURCE.modified_fileName
             ,'customer_address_base'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,SOURCE.RecordCount
             ,SOURCE.pe_flag
             ,'External Platform'
             ,'Enrichment'
             ,format(getdate(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
             ,'PacificEast Pipeline');

activities.name: Data for Enrichment
activities.description: Get all the records from the Alignment tables where md_flag='DIA Approved'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by (select null))) % 5 rnk,
source_key,Line1,Line2,City,StateOrProvince,Country,PostalCode
From (
Select top 2500 a.source_key,isnull(a.Line1,'''') as Line1,isnull(a.Line2,'''') as Line2,isnull(a.City,'''') as City
,isnull(a.StateOrProvince,'''') as StateOrProvince,isnull(a.Country,'''') as Country,Replace(isnull(a.ZIP,''''),'''''''','''') as PostalCode,a.response_id
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a
join alignment.contactbase c
on a.source_key = c.source_key
Left Join (
Select distinct trim(response_id) response_id, purpose_name from (
Select response_id, purpose_name
,row_number() over (partition by response_id order by insert_datetime desc) rnk
from audit.file_metadata
) Drv where rnk =1)b on a.response_id = b.response_id
WHERE md_flag=''DIA Approved''
AND c.crm_flag = 2
AND b.purpose_name = ''EM Suppression''
AND a.response_id=''',pipeline().parameters.response_id,'''',') DRV')

@{if(or(equals(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].AddressKey,'00000000000'),equals(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].AddressKey,' ')),

			[md_received_date]  ,
			[md_flag])
		VALUES (''',item().source_key,''',''',pipeline().parameters.response_id,''',''',formatDateTime(utcnow(),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),''',''Not Enriched'')',''),
        

concat('		INSERT INTO dbo.Enrichment_Melissa_EmSuppression([source_key] ,
				[StateorProvince]  ,
				[Longitude]  ,
				[Latitude]  ,
				[county_fips]  ,
				[County],
				[City]  ,
				[Line2]  ,
				[Line1]  ,
				[Address_Key]  ,
				[response_id]  ,
				[PostalCode]  ,
				[md_flag]  ,
				[md_received_date])
			VALUES (''',item().source_key,''',','''',activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].State,''',','
            ''',activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].Longitude,''',','
            ''',activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].Latitude,''',','
            ''',activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].CountyFIPS,''',','
            ''',replace(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].CountyName,variables('valueToBeReplaced'),variables('replaceWith')),''',','
            ''',replace(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].City,variables('valueToBeReplaced'),variables('replaceWith')),''',','
            ''',replace(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].AddressLine2,variables('valueToBeReplaced'),variables('replaceWith')),''',','
            ''',replace(activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].AddressLine1,variables('valueToBeReplaced'),variables('replaceWith')),''',','
           ''',activity('1 Rank Melissa REST API').output.Records[0].AddressKey,''',','

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by (select null))) % 5 rnk,
source_key,Line1,Line2,City,StateOrProvince,Country,PostalCode
From (
Select top 2500 a.source_key,isnull(a.Line1,'''') as Line1,isnull(a.Line2,'''') as Line2,isnull(a.City,'''') as City
,isnull(a.StateOrProvince,'''') as StateOrProvince,isnull(a.Country,'''') as Country,Replace(isnull(a.ZIP,''''),'''''''','''') as PostalCode,a.response_id
FROM alignment.customer_address_base a
join alignment.contactbase c
on a.source_key = c.source_key
Left Join (
Select distinct trim(response_id) response_id, purpose_name from (
Select response_id, purpose_name
,row_number() over (partition by response_id order by insert_datetime desc) rnk
from audit.file_metadata
) Drv where rnk =1)b on a.response_id = b.response_id
WHERE md_flag=''DIA Approved''
AND c.crm_flag = 2
AND b.purpose_name = ''EM Search Vendor Data''
AND a.response_id=''',pipeline().parameters.response_id,'''',') DRV')
